oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Metro Nashville Police Department Command School graduates with Chief Kemp, Nashville, Tennessee, 1964 July 10
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The July 10th, 1964 graduating class of the Metro Nashville Police Department Command School, with Chief Kemp in Nashville Tennessee. Kemp was the first Chief of the Metro Nashville Police Department, serving from 1963 to 1972. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kemp, Hubert Otis, 1908-1992
Police chiefs--Tennessee--Nashville; Law enforcement--Tennessee--Nashville; Police training--Tennessee--Nashville
